description: Animated dot matrix background pattern. Creates a modern, minimalist aesthetic. Alternative to GridPattern for softer visual effect.
useCase: Use DotPattern for: hero backgrounds, modern landing pages, section backgrounds, tech-themed content, creating visual interest without distraction
examples: Landing page hero with dot background

style.description: CSS styles - typically position: absolute to fill container

rendering.note: Renders as SVG pattern with circle elements

bestPractices: Use subtle colors and low opacity for background effect
Smaller dots (1-3px) for modern minimal look
